text: ==Events== *Forsyth County, Georgia and Barbour County, Alabama become counties. * A cholera epidemic affects New York City and other major American cities. *The University of Durham, England is founded (created). ==Births== * January 13 - Horatio Alger, Jr. American boys' writer, in Chelsea, Massachusetts * January 27 – Lewis Carroll, English children's writer, in Daresbury, Cheshire * November 29 – Louisa May Alcott American girls' writer, in Germantown, Pennsylvania
